item.title: Property Taxes & User Fees
item.description:
Contents Slides []() Clearest and muddiest things Slides Download the slides from today’s class
Results chains and logic models Here are all the inputs, activities, outputs, and outcomes that we identified for GSU’s MPA and MPP programs: Results chain Clearest and muddiest things Go to this form and answer these three questions: What was the muddiest thing from class today? What are you still wondering about?

item.title: Introduction to Public Finance
item.description:
Contents Slides []() Clearest and muddiest things Slides Download the slides from today’s class
Getting started with R Open the RStudio.cloud project for today. If you want to follow along on your own computer (recommended only if you feel comfortable installing packages in R), you can download the project. Clearest and muddiest things Go to this form and answer these three questions: What was the muddiest thing from class today?
